hoatChat: Omeprazol (dưới dạng Omeprazol pellet 8,5% bao tan trong ruột)
dongGoi: Hộp 1 lọ x 14 viên; hộp 3 vỉ x 10 viên
taDuoc: Manitol; disodium hydrogen ortho phosphate; sodium lauryl sulfate; calcium carbonate; crosscarmellose sodium; sugar (pharma grade); sugar spheres (30#40); starch; methyl paraben sodium; propyl paraben sodium; hydroxy propyl methyl cellulose - E5 (HPMC-E5); methacrylic acid copolymer - L30D; diethyl phthalate; talcum; titanium dioxide; sodium hydroxide; polysorbat 80
